trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality that allows a common language runtime host to participate in the flow, or migration, of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: Gir funksjonaliteten som tillater common language runtime vert delta i flyt eller overføringen av utføringskontekst.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.AppDomainManager> has a reference to a HostExecutionContextManager in its <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> property, then the common language runtime calls the manager every time a call to the <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method occurs, to allow the host to participate in the flow of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: Hvis gjeldende <xref:System.AppDomainManager>har en referanse til en HostExecutionContextManager i den <xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A>egenskapen og common language runtime kaller transportbehandling for hver gang en kall til den <xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden skjer hvis du vil tillate verten delta i flyten av utføringskontekst.</xref:System.Threading.ExecutionContext.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AppDomainManager.HostExecutionContextManager%2A> </xref:System.AppDomainManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Captures the host execution context from the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer vert utføringskontekst fra gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> is created using a safe handle containing the `IUnknown` pointer for the host executing the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>er opprettet med en sikker referanse som inneholder den `IUnknown` peker for verten kjøring gjeldende tråd.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> object representing the host execution context of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref> -objekt som representerer vert utføringskontekst for gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: Restores the host execution context to its prior state.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter vert utføringskontekst til sin opprinnelige tilstand.

trans-unit.source: `previousState` must be the object returned by the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `previousState`må være objektet som ble returnert av den <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.SetHostExecutionContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The previous context state to revert to.
trans-unit.target: Konteksten tilstanden ikke gå tilbake til.

trans-unit.source: previousState is .
trans-unit.target: previousStateis .

trans-unit.source: -or- previousState was not created on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: - eller - previousState ble ikke opprettet på gjeldende tråd.

trans-unit.source: -or- previousState is not the last state for the .
trans-unit.target: - eller - previousState er ikke den forrige tilstanden for den .

trans-unit.source: Sets the current host execution context to the specified host execution context.
trans-unit.target: Angir gjeldende verten utføringskontekst til utføringskontekst angitt vert.

trans-unit.source: The SetHostExecutionContext method sets the host execution context for the current <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SetHostExecutionContext Angir verten utføringskontekst for gjeldende <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> that has been used as the argument to another SetHostExecutionContext method call cannot be passed in as the parameter for this method.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>som er brukt i argumentet til en annen SetHostExecutionContext metodekall ikke kan sendes i som parameter for denne metoden.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create a copy of a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> object and then use the copy to set the host execution context.
trans-unit.target: Bruk i stedet den <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette en kopi av en <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>objekt og eksemplaret til sett utføringskontekst verten.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> </xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext.CreateCopy%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A> method using the object returned by this method to restore the <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Kall den <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>metoden ved hjelp av objektet som returneres av denne metoden til å gjenopprette den <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext>til sin opprinnelige tilstand.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContext> </xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager.Revert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> to be set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref> angis.

trans-unit.source: An object for restoring the <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"></xref> to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for gjenoppretting av <xref href="System.Threading.HostExecutionContext"> </xref> til sin opprinnelige tilstand.

trans-unit.source: hostExecutionContext was not acquired through a capture operation.
trans-unit.target: hostExecutionContextble ikke kjøpt via en capture-operasjon.

trans-unit.source: -or- hostExecutionContext has been the argument to a previous SetHostExecutionContext method call.
trans-unit.target: - eller - hostExecutionContext er argumentet til en tidligere SetHostExecutionContext metodekallet.
